headline: UBS Maintains a Hold on the PNC Financial Services Group (PNC)
summary: The PNC Financial Services Group, Inc. (NYSE:PNC) is one of the best large cap value stocks to buy now. On September 25, UBS analyst Erika Najarian maintained a Hold rating on the PNC Financial Services Group, Inc. (NYSE:PNC) and set a price target of $28.25. In other news, The PNC Financial Services Group, Inc. (NYSE:PNC) […]

headline: Can PNC Financial Capitalize on the Fed's Recent Rate Cut?
summary: PNC expects loan growth, easing funding costs, and Fed rate cuts to drive a 7% NII expansion in 2025.
